COPY NO. ^ ^^CABINETCOLONjALJ^TJELOPMENT CORPORATION^SJ^O ^^^L^yL^^^B E^S XJ3l State for Commonwealth relations and Secretary of State for the colonies the Activities of the Colonial Development Corporation are atpresent confined to dependent colonial territories. In view of the achievement of independence by so many of these territories it isdesirable to widen the Corporation^ terms of reference, without howeverincreasing the statutory ceiling of Exchequer lending.2. Accordingly, I ask the Cabinet to agree:-(a) that the Corporation shall be permitted to embark on new projects in any former British colonial or mandated territory which after 1948 achieved, or may hereafterachieve, independence within the Commonwealth;(b) that the name of the Corporation shall be changed to" Common wealth Development Corporation";(c) that the necessary legislation should be introduced next session; and(d) that I should be authorised.to make an announcement to this effect before the House rises.D.S.Commonwealth Relations Office, S. W. 1.20th July, 1962
